Description: Calculation of Cess on sales to SEZ Development/SEZ Unit Customer through Sales Quote/Order/Invoice with Payment of Duty
ParentUseCase: Calculation of Cess on Sales transaction

RHS.Value: Cess % Or Amount / Unit Factor Whichever Higher

Activity.Expression: Cess Factor Quantity must have a value in Tax Rates for GST Group Code {GSTGroupCode}.
Cess Amount per Unit Factor must have a value in Tax Rates for GST Group Code {GSTGroup}.
Cess UOM must have a value in GST Group {GSTGroup}.

RHS.Value: Cess % Or Amount / Unit Factor Whichever Higher

Activity.Expression: Unit of Measure must have a value in Item Unit of Measure for the Item No. {ItemNo} and Unit of Measure {UOM}.
Qty. per Unit of Measure must have a value in Item Unit of Measure for Item {ItemNo} and UOM {UOM}.
Qty. per Unit of Measure must have a value in Item Unit of Measure for Item {ItemNo} and UOM {UOM}.

Body.ConditionType: Is Less Than Or Equals To

Cess % Or Amount / Unit Factor Whichever Higher
